name: Oddwood
description:
A chaotic arcade game where you are controlled by a dice, stuck in a game of Leshy.

Made for GMTK2022 in 48 hours. Theme: Roll of the Dice.

LMB - Use, RMB - Jump

By:
Frogrammer - Programming
Dennis Pinato - Art
Daniel James Freer - Art
Bill Kiley - Music
BibikiGL - SFX

Join the server! - https://discord.gg/AdH5jZTnPX
